titleStmt.title: A pastoral elegy on the death of Mr. John Playford Note, the notes with this mark * over them, are to be sung demiquavers. The words by Mr. Tate. Set by Mr. Henry Purcell.
titleStmt.author: Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715.
Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695.

notesStmt.note: The words "Note, ... demiquavers." are gathered in brackets on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With: The Ariels songs in the play called The tempest. [London? : s.n., 1675?]
